member.name: T:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader
member.summary: Contains all the information and data about an ICC profile header.
Initializes a new IccHeader with explicit parameters.
member.param: A value that indicates the size of the ICC profile in bytes.
A value that indicates the Color Management Module for the profile.
A value that indicates the version of the ICC profile.
A value that indicates the device class profile of the ICC profile. For a list of possible values, refer to IccProfileClassType.
A value that indicates the color space used for the ICC profile. For a list of possible values, refer to IccColorspaceType.
A value that indicates the color space used for the Profile Connection Space. For a list of possible values, refer to IccColorspaceType.
IccDateTime structure that contains the date and time of creation of the ICC profile.
The ProfileSignature contains the fixed value of 0x61637379h.
A value that indicates the primary platform for which the ICC profile was created. For a list of possible values, refer to IccPlatformSignatureType.

Enumeration that indicates if the ICC profile is embedded or not, and if the ICC profile can be used independently from the embedded color data or not. For a list of possible values, refer to IccProfileFlags.
A value that indicates the device manufacturer for the device for which the ICC profile was created.
A value that indicates the device model for the device for which the ICC profile was created.
Enumeration that identifies attributes unique to a particular device. For a list of possible values, refer to IccProfileMediaFlags.
A value that indicates the rendering intent. For a list of possible values, refer to IccRenderingIntentType.
IccXyzNumber structure that indicates the CIEXYZ values of the illuminant used for the profile connection space.
A value that identifies the creator of the ICC profile.
An array that contains a value that indicates a checksum value for the ICC profile.
An array of reserved bytes for the ICC organization.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.ToString
member.summary: Overridden. Returns a meaningful name for this method.
member.returns: String containing the name of this method.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Attributes
member.summary: Gets or sets the media attribute.
member.value: Enumeration that identifies attributes unique to a particular device. For a list of possible values, refer to IccProfileMediaFlags.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.CmmID
member.summary: Gets or sets the CMM for the profile.
member.value: A value that indicates the Color Management Module for the profile.The CmmID value shall match a CMM type signature registered in the ICC registry. If no preferred CMM is identified, this member shall be set to zero (00000000h). The registration authority for this data is the ICC Technical Secretary. See the ICC web site (<http://www.color.org/index.xalter>) for contact information.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.ColorSpace
member.summary: Gets or sets the colorspace used for the ICC profile.
member.value: A value that indicates the color space used for the ICC profile. For a list of possible values, refer to IccColorspaceType.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Creator
member.summary: Gets or sets the creator of the ICC profile.
member.value: A value that identifies the creator of the ICC profile.The Creator value shall match the signature contained in the device manufacturer section of the ICC signature registry found at (<http://www.color.org/index.xalter>). If not used, this member shall be set to zero (00000000h).

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.DateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time of creation of the ICC profile.
member.value: IccDateTime structure that contains the date and time of creation of the ICC profile.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.DeviceClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the device class of the ICC profile.
member.value: A value that indicates the device class profile of the ICC profile. For a list of possible values, refer to IccProfileClassType.For all profile classes, other than a device link profile, the profile connection space member Pcs shall be either XyzData or LabData. When the device class is a device link profile, the value of the profile connection space shall be the appropriate color space from the list in IccColorspaceType.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Empty
member.summary: Gets an new empty structure.
member.value: Empty structure.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets the ICC profile flags.
member.value: Enumeration that indicates if the ICC profile is embedded or not, and if the ICC profile can be used independently from the embedded color data or not. For a list of possible values, refer to IccProfileFlags.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Illuminant
member.summary: Gets or sets the illuminant used for the PCS.
member.value: IccXyzNumber structure that indicates the CIEXYZ values of the illuminant used for the profile connection space.For the Illuminant member, the only illuminant permitted for the profile connection space is D50 (where X=0.9642; Y=1.0 and z=0.8249).

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Manufacturer
member.summary: Gets or sets the device manufacturer.
member.value: A value that indicates the device manufacturer for the device for which the ICC profile was created.The Manufacturer and Model values shall match the signature contained in the appropriate section of the ICC signature registry found at (<http://www.color.org/index.xalter>). If not used, this member shall be set to zero (00000000h).

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the device model.
member.value: A value that indicates the device model for the device for which the ICC profile was created.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Pcs
member.summary: Gets or sets the PCS colorspace.
member.value: A value that indicates the color space used for the Profile Connection Space. For a list of possible values, refer to IccColorspaceType.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Platform
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary platform for which the ICC profile was created.
member.value: A value that indicates the primary platform for which the ICC profile was created. For a list of possible values, refer to IccPlatformSignatureType.If there is no primary platform identified, the Platform shall be set to NoPlatformSignature. For a list of possible values, refer to IccPlatformSignatureType.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.ProfileId
member.summary: Gets or sets the profile id.
member.value: An array that contains a value that indicates a checksum value for the ICC profile.The ProfileId value is generated using the MD5 fingerprinting method as defined in the Internet RFC 1321. If it has not been calculated, the value of the ProfileId shall be set to zero (00000000h).

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.ProfileSignature
member.summary: Gets or sets the profile signature.
member.value: A value that indicates the profile signature.The ProfileSignature contains the fixed value of 0x61637379h.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.RenderingIntent
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering intent.
member.value: A value that indicates the rendering intent. For a list of possible values, refer to IccRenderingIntentType.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Reserved
member.summary: Gets or sets the reserved bytes.
member.value: An array of reserved bytes for the ICC organization.The Reserved value reserved for future ICC definition and shall be set to zero (00000000h).

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the ICC Profile.
member.value: A value that indicates the size of the ICC profile in bytes.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ColorConversion.IccHeader.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the ICC profile.
member.value: A value that indicates the version of the ICC profile.The Version shall contain the value 0x04200000h for ICC version 4.2.0.0 over which this ICC profile structure and all the methods associated with it was built.
